title: toshv
author: toshv
content: Hey guys, I work as a SWE for a YC startup called Coinbooks that makes accounting software for companies with crypto transactions. A user asked us to support Bitcoin miners and so we decided to build it. If you have a bitcoin mining operation or are a company with bitcoin on your balance sheet and you're interested in keeping track of all your transactions for tax purpose feel free to try out the software: Here's our landing page: https://www.coinbooks.xyz/Here's the link to try out the software: https://app.coinbooks.xyz/Thanks so much!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: The link of the software that you said we can try out is not accessible it needs an account before you can able to use them. Do you have any Demo accounts? So that we can test the sheet? Honestly, we have a free Crypto tax report if you want to track all your crypto transaction for tax purposes, I just want to check your own sheet if it is better than the tool that I use from this https://cointracking.info/tax/

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: be careful of software from newbie users that show links of websites people can get for free/cheap (not official company websites)usually people that actually know of tax law and are accountants to ensure people can actually use the info correctly don't use these tactics.
